summary: Anne B. Misita was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCA). She appears in payroll and certification reports from April 1978 to December 1978. The documents list her name, salary, and pay during the specified periods. The documents do not specify her role within the committee.
significance: Anne B. Misita's significance lies in her employment within the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, though her specific role is not detailed in the provided documents.
